findings.title: _transferAnyERC20Tokens allows the owner to transfer YfDFI tokens out from the contract
findings.description: The function _transferAnyERC20Tokens allows the owner to transfer YfDFI tokens out from the contract, with a limitation on the amount of tokens by the getStakingAndDaoAmount function but it does not guarantee deposit safety.

findings.title: Inconsistent Constant Naming Convention
findings.description: Constants should be named as UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES according to best practices.
